column4: hi, just installed ubuntu off the server cd and it doesnt seem to have a gui what do i need to do?
a server usually do not need a gui ;) you can isntall one (sudo apt-get install { xk}ubuntu-desktop)
the desktop cd sounded like a live cd in the description, would i be best off just getting the other cd and reinstalling
if you have inet connection doing what i said will install everything you need afaik (sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop)
